title: What is this font ?
content:
Thx a lot.

Font: 

 Bodoni Sans 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061022/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [we.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061022/http:/typophile.com/files/we.png) | 31.63 KB |
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content:
Hard to say with so few letters. Some sort of chopped-off serif Didot/Bodoni... More details (origin, website, more letters) would be needed to positively identify it. Some suggestions in the same vein for the moment: [Chong Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061022/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/chong-modern), [Grenale](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061022/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/insigne/grenale), **[Bodoni Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317061022/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/bodoni+sans)** (the closest so far, possibly matching)

EDIT: what Kevin said + Bodoni Sans
I second Ryuk's ID of Bodoni Sans--it's the only one of the three where the prime mark (which should be an apostrophe) matches.
thanks a lot guys. It's Bodoni Sans !
